select meet.*, (SELECT memberIdx FROM onMeetingMem mem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostIdx, (SELECT memberName FROM onMeetingMem mem JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx) as memberCnt from onMeeting meet join onMeetingMem mem on meet.onMeetingIdx = mem.onMeetingIdx join member m on mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx where m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}

SELECT distinct meet.*, (SELECT memberIdx FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostIdx, (SELECT memberName FROM onMeetingMem mem JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx) as memberCnt FROM onMeeting meet JOIN onMeetingMem mem ON meet.onMeetingIdx = mem.onMeetingIdx JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE m.memberIdx != #{memberIdx} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
